drills.name: The Game
drills.objective: To keep the opposition from moving the ball forward and try to regain the
drills.organization: In a 50Wx80L field play 8v8. The Blue team will play in 1-2-2-3 formation
guidedQuestions: 1. Who should attack the player with the ball?

2. Why do we need to
work together?
3. When should you steal the ball?
answers: The closest defender presses the player with the ball

To get and stay
compacted to prevent them from moving the ball forward
